mapper.sql: id, dat1, ts1, ts2, ts3, ts4, ts5, tim1, tim2, tim3, tim4, tim5
mapper.update: update types_date_time set dat1 = #{dat1,jdbcType=DATE}, ts1 = #{ts1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts2 = #{ts2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts3 = #{ts3,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts4 = #{ts4,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts5 = #{ts5,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tim1 = #{tim1,jdbcType=TIME}, tim2 = #{tim2,jdbcType=TIME}, tim3 = #{tim3,jdbcType=TIME}, tim4 = #{tim4,jdbcType=TIME}, tim5 = #{tim5,jdbcType=TIME} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
